solution_line_template: After Jeff swam on Saturday, there remained {total_laps} - {saturday_laps} = <<{total_laps}-{saturday_laps}={after_saturday}>>{after_saturday} laps

After Sunday morning’s {sunday_morning_laps} laps there remained {after_saturday} - {sunday_morning_laps} = <<{after_saturday}-{sunday_morning_laps}={after_sunday_morning}>>{after_sunday_morning} laps
